question: The limiting force of friction is equal to
choices: The value of friction force that stops the movement of the body
The value of friction force that cannot exceed under a given situation
The friction force when the body is just about to move
The friction force acting on a body when it is in motion
answer: The friction force when the body is just about to move

question: If the only force acting on two bodies is their mutual interactions and if both bodies start from rest, the distance travelled by each
choices: Proportional to the masses of the bodies
Inversely proportional to the masses of the bodies
Inversely proportional to the square of the masses of the bodies
Directly proportional to the square of the masses of the bodies
answer: Inversely proportional to the masses of the bodies
